works.description:
A 15-minute short film, written,
directed,  
and produced by Pierre Stefanos for Aquarian Films, LLC, which has been  
licensed to the U.S. film distributor First Run Features to be part of the
 
copyrighted DVD release "Fest Selects: Best Gay Shorts, Vol. 1,"
(UPC/EAN#:  
720229914680), a 104-minute DVD compilation of 8 short films.
